entry.title: Armenian government approval falls to three-year low

media:group.media:title: Armenian government approval falls to three-year low
media:group.media:description:
๐A new nationwide survey revealed that only 36% of Armenians believe the country is moving in the right direction. Despite waning enthusiasm, Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan remains the most trusted politician, cited by 13% of respondents. ๐Since the arrest of Russian-Armenian businessman Samvel Karapetyan, a wave of similar comments in support of him has appeared on Armenian-language Facebook pages. Many of them were created around the same and display signs typical of fake profiles, using profile photos of other people sourced from social media or other online platforms. ๐The Armenian Apostolic Church accused Prime Minister Pashinyan of planning a violent takeover of its Echmiadzin headquarters, following his call for supporters to โfreeโ the seat of Catholicos Karekin II.

entry.title: Reading the Trump administration on Armenia

media:group.media:title: Reading the Trump administration on Armenia
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of the CivilNet podcast, analyst Tigran Grigoryan shares insights from his recent trip to Washington, D.C., where he met with U.S. policymakers and experts on South Caucasus affairs. He discusses the Trump administrationโs proposed settlement between Armenia and Azerbaijan, including a controversial corridor plan through Syunik. Grigoryan also examines U.S. priorities in the region, the political risks Armenia faces in navigating the potential deal, and the deepening disconnect between the Armenian government and U.S. diaspora organizations.
0:00- Reading the view of Armenia in DC 5:24- Barrackโs suggestion for a Syunik corridor 11:18- What is behind the corridor talk? 16:27- Trumpโs prediction of an Armenia-Azerbaijan peace deal 21:43- Role of diaspora orgs in Armenia-US relations

media:group.media:description:
82-ีกีดีตีก ีีกีฐีกีถ ีีฅีฌีซึีตีกีถีจ ีฃึีฅีฉีฅ ีกีดีฅีถ ึ ึ ีฉีซีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีง ีบีกึีกีบีธึีด ิฑีบีกีฃีก ีฃีตีธึีฒีธึีดึ ิดีฅีผ 2000-ีกีฏีกีถ ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีถีฅึีซีถ ีฅีฏีฅีฌ ีง ิฑึีดีกีพีซึีซ ิฑึีกีฆีกึ ีฃีตีธึีฒี ีฝีบีธึีฟีกีฑึีจ ีฟีฅีฒีธึีด ีธึ ีฐีกึึีกีถ ีฃีตีธึีฒีฅึีธึีด ีฆีกึีฃีกึีถีฅีฌีธึึ ิฑีดีฅีถ ึ ึ ิฑึีกีฆีกึ, ิตึีกีฝีญีกีฐีธึีถ ีธึ ีีกึีคีกีถีกีทีฅีถ ีฃีตีธึีฒีฅึีซึ ีฐีกีพีกึีธึีด ีง ีฅึีฅีญีกีถีฅึีซีถ ีธึ ิฑีบีกีฃีก ีฃีตีธึีฒีซ ีฌีณีธึีด ีบีกึีกีบีธึีด ีถึีกีถึ ีฐีฅีฟึ ิฑีทีกีฏีฅึีฟีถีฅึีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีคีกีฝีฅึีถ ีกีถึีฏีกึีพีธึีด ีฅีถ 1950-60 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีถีฅึีซ ีถีกีพีกีฏีถีฅึีธีพึ ีีกีฐีกีถีซ ีดีซีกีฏ ึีกีถีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ีง, ีธึ ีซึีฅีถึ ึ ีฃีถีฅีถ ีถีธึ ีถีกีพีกีฏีถีฅึีธีพี ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีฌีกีพ ีกึีคีตีธึีถึีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกีฝีถีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีกีดีกึึ

entry.title: Caucase, corridor, clergรฉ : ce que rรฉvรจlent les tensions actuelles en Armรฉnie

media:group.media:title: Caucase, corridor, clergรฉ : ce que rรฉvรจlent les tensions actuelles en Armรฉnie
media:group.media:description:
Tigrane Yegavian dรฉcrypte les tensions actuelles en Armรฉnie.
รtat vs รglise, rรดle des oligarques, corridor de Zangezur, dรฉclarations de Trump et retour des grandes puissances dans le Caucase: quels enjeux pour Erevan et la rรฉgion? Retrouvez lโanalyse des dynamiques politiques et gรฉopolitiques en cours dans la rรฉgion avec lโexpert en gรฉopolitique.
Tigran Yegavan est co-auteur dans lโouvrage โิฟีธีฟึีพีกีฎ ีพีกีฐีกีถ. ิฑึึีกีญีตีกีถ 44-ึ ึีตีก ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซ ีขีกีฆีดีกีฏีธีฒีด ีพีฅึีฌีธึีฎีธึีฉีตีธึีถโ (ยซBouclier brisรฉ : Analyse multidimensionnelle de la guerre de 44 jours au Karabakhยป) sous la direction de Vicken Cheterian. Le livre est un recueil de 16 articles portant sur la guerre du Karabakh de 2020, la diplomatie qui lโa prรฉcรฉdรฉe, la gรฉopolitique, les perceptions profondรฉment ancrรฉes, la course aux armements, les rรฉformes militaires โ ou leur absence โ ainsi que les รฉvolutions sociales et politiques internes en Armรฉnie et en Azerbaรฏdjan.

entry.title: From Christendom to Western Civilization: Russiaโs Role in Defining the West

media:group.media:title: From Christendom to Western Civilization: Russiaโs Role in Defining the West
media:group.media:description:
Yuri Slezkine, a Russian-born American historian, translator, and professor of Russian history, delivered a lecture titled โRussia and the Concept of 'the Westโโ on June 25 in Batumi. The event was part of a symposium organized by the Monterey Initiative in Russian Studies at the Middlebury Institute of International Studies at Monterey.
The 2025 Monterey Summer Symposium on Russia took place in Batumi, Yerevan, and Tbilisi from June 25 to July 13.

media:group.media:title: ีีฝีฏีฅ ีฎีซึีกีถีซ ีซึีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฅีผีกีถีฏีตีธึีถีซีถ

ีีฅึีกีฏีกีถ ีฅึีฏึีธึีด ีญีซีฝีฟ ีฃึีกึีถีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฅีถีฉีกึีฏีพีธีฒ ีซึีกีถึีซ ีผีฅีชีซีฝีธึีถีฅึีจ ีฝีธีพีธึีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ีญีธึีกีดีกีถีฏีธึีฅีถ ีทึีปีกีถึีฅีฌ ีฃึีกึีถีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึ ึีฅีถึีถีฅึีจึ ินีฅึ ีซึีฅีถึ ีฅึีฏึีธึีด ีทีกีฟีฅึีซ ึีซีฌีดีฅึีจ ีดีฅีฎ ีงีฏึีกีถ ีนีฅีถ ีขีกึีฑึีกีถีธึีด, ีฝีกีฏีกีตีถ ีฅึีซีฟีกีฝีกึีค ีฝีฅึีธึีถีคีจ ีถีกีตีธึีด ีง ีคึีกีถึ ีดีกีฝีถีกีพีธึ ึีธึึีกีคึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีชีกีดีกีถีกีฏี ีฃีกีฒีฟีถีซึ
22-ึีค ยซีีฝีฏีฅ ีฎีซึีกีถยป-ีซ ีฐีตีธึึีฅึีถ ีงีซีถ ีซึีกีถึีซ ีผีฅีชีซีฝีธึีถีฅึ ีีกึีกึ ีีกีถีกีฐีซีถ ีธึ ิฑีดีซึ ีีกีคีฅึีซีถึ ิตีผีกีถีฏีตีธึีถีซีถ ึีกีฏีพีฅึ ิฑีขีกีฝ ีีซีกีผีธีฝีฟีกีดีซีซี ยซีีฝีฏีฅ ีฎีซึีกีถยป-ีซีถ ีถีพีซึีกีฎ ีฌีธึีฝีกีถีฏีกึีถีฅึีซ ึีธึึีกีคึีธึีฉีตีกีดีขึ ีีกึีกีฎีกีทึีปีกีถีกีตีซีถ ีฎึีกีฃึีซ ีทึีปีกีถีกีฏีธึีด ึีธึึีกีคึีพีฅึีซีถ ีีกีตีซีค ีีธึึีซีซ ยซินีฅีฐึีกีถ. ีกีถีกีพีกึีฟ ีบีกีฟีดีธึีฉีตีธึีถยป ึ ีีกีฐีกีถีค ีีกีขีซึีซ ยซิฑีดีขีธีญีจยป ึีซีฌีดีฅึีจึ
